command.value: form1="$(curl -o /dev/null -s -k -w '%{http_code}\n' https://localhost:9443/t/1.1/jaggeryapps/Payment/)" && form2="$(curl -o /dev/null -s -w '%{http_code}\n' http://localhost:80/js/TPBSAForm.min.js)" && var1=$(test $form1 = 200 && echo true); var2=$(test $form2 = 200 && echo true) && test $var1 -a $var2

labels.HAPROXY_0_HTTP_FRONTEND_ACL:
acl host_{cleanedUpHostname} hdr(host) -i {hostname}
  use_backend {backend} if host_{cleanedUpHostname}
